item.title: Report X-2024051053
item.description:
Report X-2024051053

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-22T15:12:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-01
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 5/1/2024 at approximately 1400, Dangerous Goods Administration received notification from Employee 3724286 at the research and recovery facility in Olive Branch, reporting an undeclared dangerous goods shipment. The shipment consisted of 2 fiberboard boxes, each containing 3 bottles of cosmetic products. The online safety data sheet provided by the agent classifies the commodities as UN 1993. The originally was refused by customs in Great Britain and return to the US to the research and recovery facility. The shipment is being held, pending an FAA investigation.

  • Description: PACKAGE WAS BEING UNLOADED WHEN BOX WAS FOUND LEAKING AND BROUGHT T QA. WHEN OPENED INNER PAIL HAD LEAKED FROM CLOSURE WHICH CAUSED THE BOX TO BE WET.
